data.comment: Geoff Eltringham starts the match. Barnsley with the kick-off in Barnsley.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Callum Styles.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Wycombe kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 49, Wycombe have been awarded a penalty in Barnsley...
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Joe Jacobson.
Barnsley have been awarded a penalty...
Ryan Allsop (Wycombe) has received a yellow card from Geoff Eltringham.
In the minute 61, Cauley Woodrow nets and Barnsley now lead 2-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
The home team have replaced Matty James with Herbie Kane. This is the first substitution made today by Valerien Ismael.
Valerien Ismael is making the team's second substitution at Oakwell Ground with Dominik Frieser replacing Luke Thomas.
In the minute 65, Victor Adeboyejo is replacing Conor Chaplin for Barnsley at Oakwell Ground.
Alex Mowatt (Barnsley) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jack Grimmer (Wycombe) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 75, Gareth Ainsworth (Wycombe) is making a first substitution, with Fred Onyedinma replacing Scott Kashket.
Callum Brittain for Barnsley has been booked by Geoff Eltringham and receives a first yellow card.
Callum Styles is booked for the home team.
In the minute 81, Joe Jacobson (Wycombe) has received a first yellow card.
Valerien Ismael is making the team's fourth substitution at Oakwell Ground with Romal Palmer replacing Alex Mowatt.
The away team replace David Wheeler with Matt Bloomfield.
In the minute 85, Alex Samuel is on a sub for Daryl Horgan for Wycombe.
Anis Mehmeti is replacing Adebayo Akinfenwa for Wycombe at Oakwell Ground.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
